title: Gromov-Hausdorff Geometry of Metric Trees
authors: A.O. Ivanov, I.N. Mikhailov, A.A. Tuzhilin
abstract:
In this paper, we study metric trees, without any finiteness restrictions.
For subsets of such trees, a condition that guarantees that the Hausdorff and
Gromov--Hausdorff distances from the subset to the entire metric tree are the
same is obtained. This result allows to construct a new class of shortest
geodesics (in the proper class of all metric spaces) connecting such subset of
a metric tree with the tree itself. In particular, the technique elaborated is
demonstrated on subsets of the real line.
